name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Data Scientist with 10+ years of experience leveraging advanced analytics and machine learning to drive impactful decisions in healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Python**, specializing in **Machine Learning**, **Data Analysis**, **SQL**, and **Statistics**. Skilled in data manipulation and quantitative analysis, employing techniques such as **Uplift Modeling**, **A/B Testing**, and **Geospatial Analytics** to extract insights from complex datasets. Proven ability to implement machine learning models and conduct thorough data analysis to support strategic initiatives. 
 
Experienced in full stack development with a strong background in modern technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, enhancing the capabilities of enterprise platforms with integrated AI/ML functionalities. Recognized for strong skills in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, delivering secure and compliant solutions aligned with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Passionate about developing systems that not only leverage cutting-edge technology but also create a tangible impact.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Applied **Python** and SQL for conducting comprehensive data analysis, enabling insightful decision-making through robust statistics and quantitative analysis.
•	Employed machine learning techniques for predictive modeling, including **uplift modeling** and **A/B testing**, to evaluate data-driven strategies and optimize outcomes.
•	Utilized **data manipulation** techniques to preprocess and analyze datasets, ensuring high-quality input for machine learning algorithms.
•	Conducted geospatial analysis to derive insights from geographical data, leveraging statistical methods to inform business strategies.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning models into production systems, enhancing the predictive capabilities of applications used in healthcare and finance.
•	Led initiatives to establish validation processes for statistical models, ensuring compliance with best practices and regulatory standards.
•	Implemented data visualization tools to effectively communicate findings and support strategic decision-making, utilizing **Power BI** and other visualization technologies.
•	Leveraged advanced analytics to uncover patterns and trends in complex datasets, establishing a framework for ongoing data-driven analysis and reporting.
•	Established rigorous testing strategies using tools like **Jest** and **PyTest** to ensure the reliability of machine learning models and data analysis pipelines.
•	Delivered insights on various business operations by integrating findings from network analysis, which contributed to enhanced operational efficiency.

Applied advanced **Machine Learning** techniques, including **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, to enhance financial platforms by analyzing transaction patterns and user behavior for proactive fraud detection.
Conducted **Data Analysis** using **Python** (version 3.8), leveraging **SQL** for efficient data manipulation and extraction from large datasets to provide actionable insights for business decisions.
Utilized statistical methods and **Geospatial Analytics** to quantify and visualize user interaction trends, resulting in a 15% improvement in user satisfaction scores based on A/B Testing results.
Developed and optimized data workflows by building ETL pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling seamless real-time and batch processing of financial data from over 10 external sources.
Implemented **Uplift Modeling** techniques to predict customer behavior based on historical data, achieving a 20% increase in targeted campaign effectiveness.
Executed comprehensive **Quantitative Analysis** by creating interactive dashboards with **Power BI Embedded** and **D3.js** to facilitate real-time monitoring of financial activities for stakeholders.
Engaged in continuous improvement of models for credit scoring and churn prediction, integrating findings into existing frameworks for better strategic planning and decision-making.

• Conducted **data analysis** to derive actionable insights using **Python** and SQL, leading to improved decision-making for product strategies in **e-commerce**.
• Developed and implemented **machine learning** models, including **uplift modeling** and **A/B testing**, enhancing user experience and increasing engagement by up to **25%**.
• Utilized **geospatial analytics** to analyze user behaviors based on location, influencing marketing campaigns that drove a **15%** increase in conversion rates.
• Performed rigorous **quantitative analysis** and **data manipulation** to streamline the data pipeline, resulting in a **30%** reduction in processing time for real-time analytics.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate statistical models into **Python** applications, empowering teams with data-driven insights for product feature enhancements.
• Created visualizations and reports that translated complex data findings into user-friendly formats, improving data accessibility across departments by **40%**.
• Engaged in statistical evaluations that informed high-stakes decisions, directly impacting project outcomes in line with business objectives.
• Reinforced data integrity and accuracy through meticulous data validation and cleaning processes, ensuring high-quality data utilization for predictive modeling.
